actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue war bonds to pay for Operation Allied Force and related humanitarian operations.

summary.text: Instructs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue bonds to pay for authorized expenditures for Operation Allied Force (NATO operations conducted against the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia during the continuous period beginning on March 24, 1999, and ending on the date the President designates) and related humanitarian operations.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue war bonds to pay for Operation Allied Force and related humanitarian operations.
